meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of a hoplite.
meanings.sent1: The hoplitic armor was heavy and protective.
meanings.sent2: The soldiers wore hoplitic helmets into battle.
meanings.sent3: The hoplitic shield doubled as a makeshift table during the feast.
meanings.sent4: Her hoplitic determination in the face of adversity inspired others.
meanings.sent5: The hoplitic formation stood strong against the enemy's attack.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to ancient Greek hoplites.
meanings.sent1: The hoplitic tactics were effective in ancient battles.
meanings.sent2: The hoplitic soldiers marched in formation on the battlefield.
meanings.sent3: The hoplitic armor was considered stylish in ancient Greece.
meanings.sent4: His hoplitic loyalty to his comrades was unwavering.
meanings.sent5: The hoplitic phalanx advanced steadily against the enemy.

meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of a hoplite.
meanings.sent1: The hoplitic statue stood tall in the museum.
meanings.sent2: Her hoplitic courage in the face of danger was commendable.
meanings.sent3: The hoplitic formation on the football field confused the opponents.
meanings.sent4: The hoplitic discipline of the team led them to victory.
meanings.sent5: His hoplitic strength was unmatched in the competition.
